verses.verse: And <WG2532> Being Past <WG1230> The <WG3588> Sabbath, <WG4521> Mary <WG3137> The <WG3588> Magdalene <WG3094> And <WG2532> Mary <WG3137> The Mother <WG3588> <WG3588> Of James <WG2385> And <WG2532> Salome <WG4539> Bought <WG59> Aromatics, <WG759> That <WG2443> Having Come <WG2064> They Might Anoint <WG218> Him. <WG846>
And <WG2532> Very <WG3029> Early <WG4404> On The <WG3588> <WG1520> Of The Week <WG4521> They Come <WG2064> To <WG1909> The <WG3588> Tomb, <WG3419> Having Risen <WG393> The <WG3588> Sun. <WG2246>

And <WG2532> They Said <WG3004> Among <WG4314> Themselves, <WG1438> Who <WG5101> Will Roll Away <WG617> For Us <WG2254> The <WG3588> Stone <WG3037> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Door <WG2374> Of The <WG3588> Tomb? <WG3419>
And <WG2532> Having Looked Up <WG308> They See <WG2334> That <WG3754> Has Been Rolled Away <WG617> The <WG3588> Stone : <WG3037> <WG2258> For It Was <WG1063> Great <WG3173> Very. <WG4970>

And <WG2532> Having Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Tomb, <WG3419> They Saw <WG1492> A Young Man <WG3495> Sitting <WG2521> On <WG1722> The <WG3588> Right, <WG1188> Clothed With <WG4016> A Robe <WG4749> White, <WG3022> And <WG2532> They Were Greatly Amazed. <WG1568>

<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Says <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Not <WG3361> Be Amazed. <WG1568> Jesus <WG2424> Ye Seek <WG2212> The <WG3588> Nazarene, <WG3479> Who <WG3588> Has Been Crucified. <WG4717> He Is Risen, <WG1453> <WG3756> He Is Not <WG2076> Here; <WG5602> Behold <WG1492> The <WG3588> Place <WG5117> Where <WG3699> They Laid <WG5087> Him. <WG846>

' But <WG235> Go, <WG5217> Say <WG2036> <WG3588> <WG3101> To His Disciples <WG846> And <WG2532> <WG3588> To Peter, <WG4074> That <WG3754> He Goes Before <WG4254> You <WG5209> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Galilee : <WG1056> There <WG1563> Him <WG846> Shall Ye See, <WG3700> As <WG2531> He Said <WG2036> To You. <WG5213>

And <WG2532> Having Gone Out <WG1831> Quickly <WG5035> They Fled <WG5343> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Tomb. <WG3419> <WG2192> And Possessed <WG1161> Them <WG846> Trembling <WG5156> And <WG2532> Amazement, <WG1611> And <WG2532> To No One <WG3762> Anything (lit. Nothing) <WG3762> , They Spoke, <WG2036> <WG5399> For They Were Afraid. <WG1063>

<WG450> Now Having Risen <WG1161> Early The <WG4404> First Day <WG4413> Of The Week <WG4521> He Appeared <WG5316> First <WG4412> To Mary <WG3137> The <WG3588> Magdalene, <WG3094> ' From <WG575> Whom <WG3739> He Had Cast Out <WG1544> Seven <WG2033> Demons. <WG1140>
She <WG1565> Having Gone <WG4198> Told It <WG518> To Those Who <WG3588> ' With <WG3326> Him <WG846> Had Been, Who Were <WG1096> Grieving <WG3996> And <WG2532> Weeping. <WG2799>
And They <WG2548> Having Heard <WG191> That <WG3754> He Is Alive <WG2198> And <WG2532> Has Been Seen <WG2300> ' By <WG5259> Her <WG846> Disbelieved It. <WG569>

<WG3326> And After <WG1161> These Things <WG5023> To Two <WG1417> Of <WG1537> Them <WG846> As They Walked <WG4043> He Was Manifested <WG5319> In <WG1722> Another <WG2087> Form, <WG3444> Going <WG4198> Into The <WG1519> Country; <WG68>
And They <WG2548> Having Gone <WG565> Told It <WG518> To The <WG3588> Rest; <WG3062> Neither <WG3761> Them <WG1565> Did They Believe. <WG4100>

Afterwards <WG5305> As Reclined At Table <WG345> They <WG846> To The <WG3588> Eleven <WG1733> He Was Manifested <WG5319> And <WG2532> Reproached <WG3679> <WG3588> <WG570> Their Unbelief <WG846> And <WG2532> Hardness Of Heart, <WG4641> Because <WG3754> Those Who <WG3588> Had Seen <WG2300> Him <WG846> Arisen <WG1453> <WG3756> They Believed Not. <WG4100>

And <WG2532> He Said <WG2036> To Them, <WG846> Having Gone <WG4198> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> World <WG2889> All <WG537> Proclaim <WG2784> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> To All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Creation. <WG2937>
He That <WG3588> Believes <WG4100> And <WG2532> Is Baptized <WG907> Shall Be Saved, <WG4982> <WG3588> And He That <WG1161> Disbelieves <WG569> Shall Be Condemned. <WG2632>

<WG4592> And Signs <WG1161> Those That <WG3588> Believe <WG4100> These <WG5023> Shall Follow : <WG3877> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3686> My Name <WG3450> Demons <WG1140> They Shall Cast Out; <WG1544> With Tongues <WG1100> They Shall Speak <WG2980> New; <WG2537>

Serpents <WG3789> They Shall Take Up; <WG142> And If <WG2579> Deadly <WG2286> Anything <WG5100> They Drink <WG4095> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> Them <WG846> , Shall It Injure; <WG984> Upon The <WG1909> Infirm <WG732> Hands <WG5495> They Shall Lay, <WG2007> And <WG2532> Well <WG2573> They Shall Be. <WG2192>

The <WG3588> Indeed <WG3303> Therefore <WG3767> Lord <WG2962> After <WG3326> <WG3588> Speaking <WG2980> To Them <WG846> Was Taken Up <WG353> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Heaven, <WG3772> And <WG2532> Sat <WG2523> At The <WG1537> Right Hand <WG1188> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>

<WG1565> And They <WG1161> Having Gone Forth <WG1831> Preached <WG2784> Everywhere, <WG3837> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Working With Them, <WG4903> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> Confirming <WG950> By <WG1223> The <WG3588> Following Upon It <WG1872> Signs. <WG4592> Amen. <WG281>
